paths.name: @/lib/supabase/service
paths.message: DEPRECATED: Use @/lib/supabase/service.server for API routes, @/lib/supabase/client for client components, or @/lib/supabase/server for server components.

paths.name: @/lib/supabase/service.server
paths.message: Use the service client only in server-only files (e.g., app/api/**, lib/**/*.server.ts, app/**/server/**). For client components use @/lib/supabase/client, for server components use @/lib/supabase/server.
